Package java112.analyzer

Class FileAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • java112.analyzer.FileAnalysis
  • public class FileAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    Analyzer's main controller class. Controls the correct argument count, and calls methods to analyze text input and generate reports as output files.

        public DistinctTokensAnalyzer getDistinctAnalyzer()

        Returns:
        distinctAnalyzer the instance variable

        public FileSummaryAnalyzer getSummaryAnalyzer()
        Getter for the summaryAnalyzer instance variable
        Returns:
        summaryAnalyzer, the instance var containing a FileSummaryAnalyzer

      • initializeAnalyzers

        public void initializeAnalyzers()
        Initializes both Analyzer instance variables.

      • initializeInputReader

        public java.io.BufferedReader initializeInputReader​(java.lang.String inputPath)
        Creates and returns an instance of a BufferedReader to be used to read from the input file. NOTE: does not close the reader
        Parameters:
        inputPath - is the user-inputted path to an input file, used to initialize the BufferedReader.
        Returns:
        input, an instance of BufferedReader if successfully initialized null if not successfully initialized.

      • generateTokens

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateTokens​(java.io.BufferedReader input)
        Loop through the input file, BufferedReader input, and add each token found to the tokens ArrayList as a string. The delimiter is whitespace.
        Parameters:
        input - a BufferedReader containing the input file
        Returns:
        tokens an ArrayList containing all tokens in the file

      • processTokens

        public void processTokens​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tokens)
        Loops through the tokens array, passing each token to each of the Analyzer instance variables for this class.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the completed ArrayList of all tokens in the file

      • writeOutputFiles

        public void writeOutputFiles​(java.lang.String inputPath)
        Call the methods for both analyzer instance variables to generate their respective file outputs.
        Parameters:
        inputPath - the user inputted path to the file being analyzed

      • closeInput

        public void closeInput​(java.io.BufferedReader input)

      • analyze

        public void analyze​(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        Primary controller method for the application system. Validates the amount of arguments passed in from the command line, then calls other helper methods to carry out analysis tasks.
        Parameters:
        arguments - command line args passed in to Driver, must be 1
